pages.title: Asian Box Turtle
pages.text: The southern Vietnamese box turtle ($(o)Cuora picturata$()) is endemic to the southern mountainous regions of Vietnam, and possibly also occurring in extreme eastern Cambodia and southern Laos.

pages.title: Asian Box Turtle
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:apple$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
